reason: Fed Policy Shock: HAWKISH_PIVOT - FOMC minutes released May 22 revealed that 'various' officials mentioned a willingness to tighten policy further if inflation risks materialize, representing a more hawkish stance than the post-meeting press conference initially suggested.

payload.summary: FOMC minutes released May 22 revealed that 'various' officials mentioned a willingness to tighten policy further if inflation risks materialize, representing a more hawkish stance than the post-meeting press conference initially suggested.
payload.market_impact: Bullish for USD as Treasury yields rise; Bearish for Gold and other commodities due to 'higher-for-longer' interest rate expectations.
